name: Casa Hue
description: Casa Hue Token ($HUE) is a blockchain-native digital asset designed to power the Casa Hue lifestyle ecosystem. Built initially on the Solana blockchain for speed and low fees, it features cross-chain capabilities to expand usability across Ethereum and other major chains. $HUE enables community rewards, exclusive content access, and brand engagement through fashion, art, and travel experiences tied to the Casa Hue brand.
